title: Vikramjit Singh resigns as president of Lemon Tree Hotels
description: Lemon Tree Hotels announced in a regulatory filing that Vikramjit Singh, the company's president, has resigned to pursue entrepreneurial endeavors. The resignation, effective January 31, 2024, was disclosed on Wednesday. Singh has served the hotel chain for 18 years. In his resignation letter, Singh cited no 'material reasons' for his departure.
